name: LEGO Dimensions: Eris (Legends of Chima) Fun Pack
summary: Team up with Eris from Lego Chima to outsmart the competition! Join Chima's tactical warrior in a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Build and place the Eagle Princess on the Lego Toy Pad to launch her into the game, then activate her special Super Strength, CHI, Target and Flying abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. Send in the Eagle Interceptor to help her on her quest and rebuild it into an Eagle Skyblazer and Eagle Swoop Diver for upgraded in-game powers!
